name: Bill Chirico
tagline: Full-stack architect building scalable systems and mentoring the next generation.
bio: Bill is the CEO and Founder of Volvox. He is a seasoned full-stack engineer with 10+ years of experience building high-traffic web applications. He specializes in React, Node.js, and cloud architecture. Previously at Google and Stripe.
